TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Duplexing extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定打印机是使用单面打印，还是使用某种类型的双面（双工打印）打印。

span.span: Specifies whether a printer uses one-sided printing or some type of two-sided (duplex) printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要用于以下目的使用此类型的值：Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 作为的成员集合，这是一个属性的，这些值指示的单侧和双侧打印打印机所支持的类型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the kinds of one-sided and two-sided printing that the printer supports. - 值作为属性，它们指示要使用单侧打印或某些类型的双侧打印的打印机。As the value of the property of a , they direct the printer to use one-sided printing or some kind of two-sided printing. **未知**属性中永远不会使用值对象。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 你决不能设置属性**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建*PrintTicket 文档*到无法识别的双工选项设置的双工功能 (即，一个选项，中未定义[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，则构造与该文档的应用程序中的对象将具有**未知**的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the duplexing feature to an unrecognized duplexing option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. .. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing OneSided = int32(1)

summary.span: 仅在每张纸的单面上输出打印。

span.span: Output prints on only one side of each sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing TwoSidedLongEdge = int32(3)

summary.span: 在每张纸的两个面上输出打印，其沿着平行于 的边缘翻转。

span.span: Output prints on both sides of each sheet, which flips along the edge parallel to the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing TwoSidedShortEdge = int32(2)

summary.span: 在每张纸的两个面上输出打印，其沿着平行于 的边缘翻转。

span.span: Output prints on both sides of each sheet, which flips along the edge parallel to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
